HI My name is Deepanshu peoples calls me Deepu this project only learning purpose for me and practice real life I am using chatgpt and documentation for better knowledge, i will be not a copy paster, i will understand all the things that i do in this project, i will not make this project bigger, its short clean and easy for begginer Because i dont want to frustate to start with making bigger proect lets start on main topic : - my learning mode is on some begginer freindly steps that is it :-

Steps: 
1. Problem Definition 
2. EDA
3. Clean
4. Basic Features 
5. train-Test split
6. Baseline Model
7. Evaluate property 


lets start steps:- 
1. Problem Definition:- 
    1. Problem: Predict Flower species based on physical measurements
    2. Type: Multi-class classification
    3. Target: species(3 classes)
    4. Features: SepalLengthCm, SepalWidthCm, PetalLengthCm, PetalWidthCm
    5. Metrics: accuracy
    6. constraints: None (academic dataset)

2. EDA:- 
    1. Structure: (What do I have)
        #Code-level: df.shape, df.info(), df.head()
        1. Rows?: 
        2. Columns?: 
        3. Data Types?:
        4. Categorical?: 
        5. Numeric?: 
    2. Distribution:(How does the data behave?)
        #Code-level: df.describe(), df.hist()
        1. Mean 
        2. Median
        3. std 
        4. Skewness 
        5. Outliers
    3. Relationship: (Who is Influencing Whom?)
        #Code-level: df.corr(), sns.heatmap(), sns.scatterplot()
        1. Feature Vs Target 
        2. Feature Vs Features
    4. Data Quality: (Is the data Clean or Fraud?)
        #Code-level: df.isnull().sum(), df.duplicate().sum
        1. Missing Values 
        2. Duplicate Rows
        3. impossible Values
    5. Target behavior: (What I am Predicting)
        #Code-level: df['target].value_counts()
        1. Class Imbalance?
        2. Distribution
        3. Rare class
